programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour
programme.desc: The penultimate session of this high stakes cash games sees Las Vegas businessman Dave Krosky test the patience of his opponents. Meanwhile, pro players Maria Ho and Sam Grafton clash in a huge pot.

programme.title: Pokerstars Big Game on Tour
programme.desc: The pressure is on as this high stakes Vegas poker game concludes. Loose Cannon Lily only has a few hands left to make a profit. Meanwhile, Dave is playing wilder than ever.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: The €100,000 Super High Roller reaches its finale with six elite players vying for nearly €1.4 million. 2015 Monte Carlo Main Event champion Adrian Mateos, faces off against poker heavyweights Mikita Badziakouski, László Bujtas, and Marius Gierse.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: After a three-year hiatus, the prestigious EPT Monte Carlo €5,000 Main Event returns in spectacular fashion. Day 2 brings together poker's biggest names.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Tension mounts as the money bubble approaches in Monte Carlo's Main Event. With 159 players set to cash for at least €8,690, every decision matters. EPT legends Patrik Antonius and Davidi Kitai command the feature table.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: The money bubble has burst, but for seasoned pro Ole Schemion-who has earned over $5 million in Monte Carlo alone-a minimum cash isn't enough. He faces a formidable challenge from French star Gaëlle Baumann and online legend Jussi Nevanlinna.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: PSPC champion Ramon Colillas surges into the top five as just 40 players remain in the EPT Monte Carlo Main Event. Day 3 intensifies as competitors battle to reach the final two tables.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: The field narrows to just 16 survivors, including EPT Dublin champion Niall Farrell and PSPC winner Ramon Colillas. With over €41,000 already locked up, the stakes couldn't be higher as players fight for their place at the final table of nine.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Nine players remain, but only six will advance to the final day with a shot at nearly €1 million and poker immortality. Can PSPC champion Ramon Colillas extend his remarkable run to another major final table, or will his epic journey end?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: The moment of truth arrives at the EPT Monte Carlo final table. Six players-two businessmen, one qualifier, and three seasoned professionals-wage the ultimate battle for almost €1 million and the coveted EPT trophy.

programme.title: PokerStars Players Championship
programme.desc: The biggest buy-in tournament in history sees more than 1000 players - amateurs, pros and sports stars - come to the Bahamas to compete for more than $5m.

programme.title: PokerStars Players Championship
programme.desc: NBA star Paul Pierce and UFC announcer Bruce Buffer are among the celebrities taking to the poker tables in the Bahamas, as Day 1 of the biggest High Roller tournament in history continues.

programme.title: PokerStars Players Championship
programme.desc: Phil 'The Poker Brat' Hellmuth takes centre stage on Day 2 of the biggest $25k poker tournament ever held. Pro players, amateurs and celebrities compete for a share of the $26m prize pool.

programme.title: PokerStars Players Championship
programme.desc: More action from the Bahamas, where hundreds of amateur players who've qualified for free are taking on their poker heroes. British pros Sam Grafton and Benjamin 'Spraggy' Spragg are among those chasing the $5.1m first prize.

programme.title: The Comeback with Craig Carton
programme.desc: Craig Carton sits down with those who have experienced the highs and lows of gambling addiction to amplify their stories, break down the stigma surrounding gambling disorder, raise awareness of support resources for individuals and their families.

programme.title: PokerStars Players Championship
programme.desc: It's bubble time in the Bahamas! The moment approaches when players in the biggest $25k poker tournament in history start sharing the $26m prize pool. But a few will miss out on the money.

programme.title: Up & Adams
programme.desc: Kay Adams and a rotating roster of current and former players discuss the biggest storylines in the NFL.

programme.title: PokerStars Players Championship
programme.desc: 1,000 players came to the Bahamas. Now, fewer than 150 remain. The spotlight is on the chip leaders, as amateurs, poker pros and a former Super Bowl winner eye the top prize of $5.1m.

programme.title: PokerStars Players Championship
programme.desc: It's the penultimate day of the biggest High Roller of all time. Amateur poker players Jackie Burkhart and Michael Robionek look to get the better of the pros, advance to the final and win a seven-figure score.

programme.title: PokerStars Players Championship
programme.desc: The race to the final table begins, with 16 players remaining in this $25k buy-in poker tournament in the Bahamas. Canadian pro Griffin Benger hopes to dominate and stay in contention for the $5.1m top prize.

programme.title: PokerStars Players Championship
programme.desc: It's the final table of the biggest $25k event in poker history. Eight players remain, including two who've qualified for free. They're all competing for the prestigious Championship trophy and a first prize of $5.1m.

programme.title: PokerStars Caribbean Adventure
programme.desc: The Super High Roller kicks off PCA 2018. It's $100k to play, with $4.7m in the prize pool. Hollywood star Kevin Hart and poker pro Daniel Negreanu headline proceedings on Day 2.
